sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useConversations } from '../context/ConversationsProvider'; export default function Conversations() { const { conversations, selectedConversationIdx } = useConversations(); return (
{conversations.map((conversation, idx) => {

{conversation.recipients.join(', ')}

Ok, see you at the subway in a bit.

Just now

})} {/*

Tony Stark

Hey, Are you there?

10min

Scarlett Johansson

You sent a photo.

1h

John Snow

You missed a call John.

4h

*/}
) }
